title: Posada El Cristo de la Luz
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A late night restaurant and hookah lounge. Vegan choices include hummus, falafel, yabrak, eggplant with tomato, couscous with almonds, and various salads. For menu of the day you choose a 1st plate and an entree, or order individual plates. Its outside terrace shares walls with the historic city. On occasion there is live music. The owner from Syria, who speaks English, will help you decide on a vegan meal as well as tell you about the history of the quirky building that houses the restaurant.
